Key Match Events: Trae Young hit a game-winning half-court shot to give the Hawks a 124-121 victory over the Jazz
Post-Match Reflections: The Hawks got back above.500 in the middle of a topsy-turvy season
The win showed the Hawks' high-end potential, such as during their run to the NBA Cup semifinals
Miscellaneous Highlights: Clint Capela scored 18 points on 9-for-11 shooting
De'Andre Hunter scored 17 points off the bench
Dyson Daniels added 16 points to help the Hawks
Lauri Markkanen scored 35 points for the Jazz, including 8 three-pointers
Collin Sexton added 24 points for the Jazz, including the game-tying bucket
Others: Trae Young's shot will be added to his list of late-game heroics in the NBA
